tophersmith.security.headers.util

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • tophersmith.security.headers.util.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends Object
    The Validator class contains multiple helper methods to verify that given values conform to certain characteristics
    Author:
    Chris Smith
